channel.title: Documentation on Odin Programming Language
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Odin Programming Language

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: How to download and install the Odin compiler. Both from source or from a binary release, along with a list of per-platform requirements.

item.title: Overview
item.description: An overview of the Odin programming language and its features.

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: Answers to commonly asked questions about Odin.

item.title: Packages
item.description: Documentation for all the official packages part of the core and vendor library collections.

item.title: Nightly Builds
item.description: Get the latest nightly builds of Odin.

item.title: Running Tests
item.description: A walkthrough of Odin’s test runner.
